name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The article "A girl from another province died in my rented apartment" is breathtaking. It tells the story of a 33-year-old single girl who graduated from a 211 university in Beijing and took the civil service exam many times. Even though she ranked first in the written exam, she was never admitted. In April this year, she came to Xi'an, Shaanxi from her hometown in a poor mountain village in Ningxia to find a job. She died in her rented house in early June. She was not found until about 20 days after her death... Before her death, the girl blocked all her relatives.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/v7UYq5uDnp

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Warning] Tonight, several bloggers had their accounts hacked. After hacking these accounts, the hackers disguised their accounts as X's official accounts and continued to steal more people's accounts through private messages.
Please do not click on any URLs in such private messages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 18, in Jieshou, Anhui, the former director of the Chengdong Police Station in Jieshou City reported in his real name: he was wrongly imprisoned for two years because he refused to go along with the richest man in Jieshou City and the deputy secretary of the municipal party committee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 17, Paris, France. The Chinese Chamber of Commerce in France and other groups jointly protested and condemned the flag incident at the Evergreen Laurel Hotel in Paris.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 17 (Released) Xi'an, Shaanxi. BYD Fangchengbao car owners defend their rights due to vehicle quality issues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 18, Jiangxi Shangrao officials released a report on Li Peixia's serious violations of discipline and law: After investigation, it was found that Mao Qi had used his power to influence Li Peixia to have an improper sexual relationship, and Li Peixia violated life discipline in order to adjust her position and get promoted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 19, Guangdong. A female food delivery driver collided with an old man while riding a bicycle. The female food delivery driver's face was bleeding, but she did not pay attention to her injuries at the first time, but opened her mobile phone to process the order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 18, Jiangxi Shangrao reported the results of the investigation into the "Wannian County Township Party Secretary Li Peixia's report of County Party Secretary Mao Qi's sexual assault" Li Peixia was expelled from the Party and removed from public office for serious violations of discipline and law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to news on August 17, after falling for three consecutive months, China's youth unemployment rate rose again to 17.1% in July this year, an increase of 3.9 percentage points from the previous month, the highest so far this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 18, Guangdong. A female food delivery driver collided with an old man while riding a bicycle. The female food delivery driver's face was bleeding, but she did not pay attention to her injuries at the first time, but opened her mobile phone to process the order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 18, Zhenguan released a statement, emphasizing that what was described in the article was a true event and that the article has now been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 17, Guangdong. A netizen posted on Xiaohongshu: "Oh my god, two spies" and attached a photo of a green light in the house of a resident in the opposite building. Some netizens replied that they were spies and asked the netizen who posted the message to report it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to Taiwan media "TVBS News Network" on the 16th, Taiwanese artist "Xiao Tiantian", a guest on "Kangxi Is Coming", recently announced that she would move to Xiamen with her 2-year-old daughter to start a new life. She said frankly that the reason for leaving was that she did not want her daughter to live in an environment full of rumors.
In response, netizens replied, "You have finally come to the right place. The media here never lies."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 13, Zeekr launched a new model. However, Zeekr launched a new model only half a year ago, and also added features and reduced prices, which caused dissatisfaction among old car owners. Car owners gathered together to defend their rights. Afterwards, some car owners said they received a call from the police, asking if they planned to defend their rights in the near future. Some netizens also said that they were persuaded by the police just because they criticized Zeekr online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens reported that the Ruzhou City Center for Disease Control and Prevention in Pingdingshan, Henan Province, illegally dismissed 41 people who were publicly recruited, which aroused concern. The dismissed employees said that "the leader verbally informed us that the exam was invalid and we didn't need to come to work next week. We have not been paid and have never mentioned compensation."
Official announcement: The recruitment plan violated the regulations and was invalidated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 17, economist Li Yang suggested to CSRC Chairman Wu Qing that the securities market should provide "some places for old men and women to put their retirement money."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 18, Poly Yueyuntai in Chang'an District, Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province
On one hand, the owners protested against false propaganda and price cuts
On the other hand, the workers held banners to demand wages and defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The merchant said that he knew he had affected many people's interests, but if he did not change, the industry would die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 14, Wuhan, Hubei. A woman posted a video saying that her son was a retired soldier who died from high-intensity work while working in a workshop of a Foxconn company, and has not received a penny of compensation so far.
In 2022, Jing Xingqi entered the workshop of Fulian Technology Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Wuhan Foxconn, through labor dispatch. In November 2022, Jing Xingqi had a fever for several consecutive days. On the evening of the 15th, he asked for leave from the workshop leader, but was forced to go to work.
On the morning of December 18, he was found dead in the staff dormitory, and has not received a penny of compensation so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 17, Malaysia. A netizen posted a video asking why banks and airports in Malaysia all have the flag of the Republic of China, and are distinguished from China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 16, Sichuan. The man posted a video saying that he was an assistant at a research institute in Beijing. He made a machine learning model, and one set of data did not perform well, but the teacher just asked him to delete it. There was another project to make a physical robot, but the manufacturer only used sheet metal to fold a robot frame and stuffed two computers in it. The price for such a robot was 200,000. The man said, "My dream of becoming a scientist when I was a child should be shattered."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, a 33-year-old security guard died suddenly in the toilet while on night shift at Guangdong Longxiang Guard Security Company. The deceased's sister said, "When I opened his wallet, there was only one dollar in it. A 30-year-old man only had one dollar in his wallet." His brother worked in two shifts, one shift lasted 10 hours, and his monthly salary was 4,000 yuan. And when the brother was in trouble, he asked for help in the work group, but no one found him. He was still patrolling at the last moment of his life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 18, Changchun, Jilin. An acrobat in the Siberian Tiger Park fell from the air during a performance and landed heavily on the ground.
Park staff: The person has been sent to the hospital and follow-up is still in progress.
